item.title: Blogger Go Cli
item.description: Introduction We will be creating a commandLine utility in Go to upload a post in Google blogger. Account Preparation You need to have a google account (gmail) (Paid account NOT required). Once you have a google account, Login to https://console.developers.google.com/apis/credentials and create a new Project here. Click on Dashboard on left hand column, and click on + ENABLE APIS AND SERVICES. Type in blogger in search bar, and select Blogger API v3 and then click ENABLE.
